title: Test MCP Integration with chora-compose
description: Test chora-compose MCP server capabilities to determine Path A/B vs Path C for inbox generation implementation
background: Week 4 pilot complete (94.9% quality). Discovered production MCP server with 24 tools running in Docker on port 8000.
rationale: Need to test MCP capabilities before deciding between Path A/B (8-16 hours with chora-compose) vs Path C (20-30 hours standalone)
